mapper.select: select c.id as val, c.name as text from gds_classify c where pid = #{pid} order by id asc;
select b.id as val, b.name as text from gds_brand b order by id asc;
select t.*, c.pid as classifyPID from gds_goods t, gds_classify c where t.id = #{id} and t.classifyID = c.id;
mapper.update: update gds_goods set enable = #{enable}, modifier = #{modifier}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from gds_image where goodsID = #{goodsID} order by category asc, sortNum asc;
mapper.delete: delete from gds_image where id = #{id} and sortNum != '0';
